trans-unit.source:
\n

Provides information about, and means to manipulate, the current environment and platform.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx$ xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx$ xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This class cannot be inherited.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a unique identifier for the current managed thread.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An integer that represents a unique identifier for this managed thread.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx x xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value that indicates whether the current application domain is being unloaded or the common language runtime (CLR) is shutting down.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx $XXX$ xx xxxxxxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source: true if the current application domain is being unloaded or the CLR is shutting down; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx XXX xx xxxxxxxx xxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx.$$xxxxxx$$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the NetBIOS name of this local computer.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx XxxXXXX xxxx xx xxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A string containing the name of this computer.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of this computer cannot be obtained.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the newline string defined for this environment.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the number of processors on the current machine.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The 32-bit signed integer that specifies the number of processors on the current machine.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx 00$xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: There is no default.
trans-unit.target: Xxxxx xx xx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
If the current machine contains multiple processor groups, this property returns the number of logical processors that are available for use by the common language runtime (CLR).

\n
trans-unit.target: Xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx$ xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx $XXX$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets current stack trace information.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the number of milliseconds elapsed since the system started.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A 32-bit signed integer containing the amount of time in milliseconds that has passed since the last time the computer was started.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X 00$xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Replaces the name of each environment variable embedded in the specified string with the string equivalent of the value of the variable, then returns the resulting string.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx$ xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A string containing the names of zero or more environment variables.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
Each environment variable is quoted with the percent sign character (%).

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx $$$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A string with each environment variable replaced by its value.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: name is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxx$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Terminates this process and returns an exit code to the operating system.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The exit code to return to the operating system.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
Use 0 (zero) to indicate that the process completed successfully.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx 0 $xxxx$ xx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The caller does not have sufficient security permission to perform this function.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Immediately terminates a process after writing a message to the Windows Application event log, and then includes the message in error reporting to Microsoft.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx x xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxx x xxxxxxx xx xxx Xxxxxxx Xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx$ xxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx Xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A message that explains why the process was terminated, or null if no explanation is provided.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Immediately terminates a process after writing a message to the Windows Application event log, and then includes the message and exception information in error reporting to Microsoft.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx x xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxx x xxxxxxx xx xxx Xxxxxxx Xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx$ xxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx Xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A message that explains why the process was terminated, or null if no explanation is provided.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An exception that represents the error that caused the termination.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This is typically the exception in a catch block.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx x $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Retrieves the value of an environment variable from the current process.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the environment variable.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The value of the environment variable specified by variable, or null if the environment variable is not found.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx $xx$xxxxxxxx$$xx$$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: variable is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxxxx$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The caller does not have the required permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Retrieves all environment variable names and their values from the current process.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A dictionary that contains all environment variable names and their values; otherwise, an empty dictionary if no environment variables are found.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The caller does not have the required permission to perform this operation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The buffer is out of memory.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Creates, modifies, or deletes an environment variable stored in the current process.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of an environment variable.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A value to assign to variable.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxx xx xxxxxx xx $xx$xxxxxxxx$$xx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: variable is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxxxx$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The caller does not have the required permission to perform this operation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns a string array containing the command-line arguments for the current process.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx$xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An array of string where each element contains a command-line argument.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx x xxxxxxx$xxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The first element is the executable file name, and the following zero or more elements contain the remaining command-line arguments.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx$ xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx$xxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The system does not support command-line arguments.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx$xxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x
